text.en: Grant your blessings in the blissful expanse of self-aware, unchanging pristine awareness,
text.en-trans: rangrig gyurmé yeshe dé long du

text.en: So that I may meet the form of the glorious guru, permanent and all-pervading,
text.en-trans: tak ching khyabpa palden lamé ku

text.en: Within the spontaneous and uncontrived state,
text.en-trans: gangshar machö ngang né zhal jal té

text.en: And realize the three kāyas, inseparable!
text.en-trans: ku sum yermé tokpar jingyi lob
